programme.title: Red Riding: 1974
programme.desc: Rookie journalist Eddie Dunford is determined to find the truth in an increasingly complex maze of lies and deceit surrounding the police investigation into a series of child abductions.

programme.title: Red Riding: 1980
programme.desc: The Home Office bring in senior Manchester detective Peter Hunter to conduct a secret review of the Ripper investigation to date.

programme.title: Red Riding: 1983
programme.desc: When another child goes missing, washed-up solicitor John Piggott unwittingly provides a catalyst for Detective Chief Superindent Maurice Jobson to start to right some wrongs.

programme.title: Judgment Night
programme.desc: Four young friends, while taking a shortcut en route to a local boxing match, witness a brutal murder which leaves them running for their lives.

programme.title: The Stunt Man
programme.desc: Running from the law, Vietnam vet Cameron stumbles on a movie shoot just in time to interfere with a staged accident, causing the stunt man's death. Rather than turn Cameron in, director Eli Cross makes him an offer he can't refuse: replace the dead stunt man in return for safe harbor.

programme.title: Breakfast Of Champions
programme.desc: A rich car dealer is losing his mind. His son lives in the bomb shelter. His suicidal wife has an affair with his transvestite sales manager.

programme.title: Holy Motors
programme.desc: From dawn to dusk, a few hours in the shadowy life of a mystic man named Monsieur Oscar.

programme.title: Dreamscape
programme.desc: A young psychic on the run from himself is recruited by a government agency experimenting with the use of the dream-sharing technology and is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of the US president.
